mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (USER_SEQ, TARGET_USER_SEQ, TARGET_USER_GROUP_ID, NOTICE_TYPE, NOTICE_CONTENT_ID, NOTICE_READ_YN, NOTICE_TIME) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{targetUserSeq}, #{targetUserGroupId}, #{noticeType}, #{noticeContentId}, "n", now())
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID as noticeId, USER_SEQ as userSeq, NOTICE_TYPE as noticeType, NOTICE_CONTENT_ID as noticeContentId, NOTICE_READ_YN as noticeReadYn, TARGET_USER_SEQ as targetUserSeq, TARGET_USER_GROUP_ID as targetUserGroupId, NOTICE_TIME as noticeTime FROM NOTICE WHERE TARGET_USER_SEQ = #{targetUserSeq} And TARGET_USER_GROUP_ID = #{targetUserGroupId} ORDER BY NOTICE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end};
